    Table with descriptive statistics

    descriptives.Rd

    Table with descriptive statistics

    Usage

    descriptives(data, round = 2, labels = FALSE)

    Arguments

    data

    A data frame

    round

    Digits for round function

    labels

    If TRUE, item labels are added.

    Value

    A data frame with descriptive statistics

    Examples

    descriptives(ex_itrf)
#>         name valid missing mean   sd min  max range median  mad
#> 1   itrf_I_1  4247     529 0.38 0.72   0 3.00  3.00   0.00 0.00
